title: WhatsApp message claiming XBB Covid-19 subvariant more toxic and deadly than Delta variant untrue: MOH
description: SINGAPORE — Allegations circulating on WhatsApp that the Omicron XBB subvariant of the coronavirus causing Covid-19 is "five times more toxic", more deadly and harder to detect than the Delta variant are untrue, the Ministry of Health (MOH) said.

title: Bill introduced to streamline family hearings, allow court to check finances of ex-spouse not paying maintenance
description: SINGAPORE — Family court proceedings may soon be simpler and more efficient for people involved in cases if a Bill introduced in Parliament on Thursday (April 20) is passed. Among other changes, it aims to streamline the enforcement of spousal and child maintenance payments.

title: Ageing society: S'pore can cushion impact and 'even reap dividends' after decades of preparation, says Ong Ye Kung
description: SINGAPORE — The strong foundation Singapore has prepared for an ageing society means the nation is now in a position to cushion the impact of a greying population and perhaps “even reap the dividends” from it, Health Minister Ong Ye Kung said on Thursday (April 20).

title: When bicycles collide: Need for speed, lack of etiquette top reasons for accidents, say road cyclists
description: SINGAPORE — A lack of etiquette, a disregard for laws and a need to exhibit showmanship are some key reasons why accidents between cyclists tend to occur.

title: 4G team 'in place' but unity, support from all needed to keep S'pore 'exceptional' in troubled world: PM Lee
description: SINGAPORE — To try to ensure long-term good leadership, “a strong and capable” fourth-generation (4G) leadership team has been put in place to take over from the current leadership, Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong said on Wednesday (April 19).

title: Firms screening EP applicants to have at least 3 years' experience; MOM studying use of digital certificates for verification
description: SINGAPORE — Companies that want to screen Employment Pass (EP) applications must meet certain requirements from Sept 1, including having at least three years of experience in carrying out authenticity checks on educational qualifications as well as accreditation checks on educational institutions.

title: Analysis: Wealth taxes on inherited property, luxury cars are 'attractive' suggestions by MPs, but challenging, costly to enforce
description: SINGAPORE — A tax on luxurious goods such as high-end cars and landed property as well as an inheritance duty on multi-million-dollar homes may seem like plausible ways to protect Singapore's meritocracy, but it can be challenging and even costly to implement and enforce such measures.

title: Hybrid solar eclipse draws thousands to remote Australian town
description: SYDNEY — A rare hybrid solar eclipse over a remote town on Australia's west coast drew thousands on Thursday (April 20) to witness the event.

title: World facing 'unprecedented' situation of 3 simultaneous crises, posing 'changes and shocks' for Singapore: PM Lee
description: SINGAPORE — In the midst of a fraught global situation of deepening geopolitical conflicts and protectionism, countries around the world are now in a “vicious circle” of trade and hostility where they are less likely to trust others to play by the rules, Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong said.

title: Man taken to hospital after collision with another cyclist along Upper Thomson Road
description: SINGAPORE — A man was taken to hospital following a collision with another cyclist along Upper Thomson Road on Sunday (April 16) morning.

title: Police arrest 2 men suspected of selling 1,700 pairs of counterfeit footwear worth more than S$370,000
description: SINGAPORE — Two men aged 24 and 26 were arrested on suspicion of being involved in the sale of some 1,700 pairs of footwear with purported trademark infringements.

title: K-pop star Moonbin of boy band Astro dies at 25
description: SEOUL — K-pop star Moonbin, a member of the boy band Astro, has died, his music label and South Korean police said Thursday (April 20), prompting an outpouring of grief from fans.

title: Two Texas cheerleaders shot after one tried to enter wrong car
description: WASHINGTON — Two cheerleaders were shot in a Texas parking lot after one mistakenly tried to enter the wrong car, part of a spate of similar incidents this week in the United States.

title: Meta lays off tech teams, battering employee morale
description: NEW YORK — Meta Platforms Inc on Wednesday (April 20) carried out another round of job cuts, this time hitting engineers and adjacent tech teams, as Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg further moved to streamline the business in a bid to make 2023 a "year of efficiency".

title: Commentary: Same moon, different dates for Hari Raya (again!)
description: The month of Ramadan, which falls on the ninth month in the Islamic lunar calendar, is coming to an end. Muslims around the world are preparing for Aidilfitri, which the Malays commonly refer to as Hari Raya (the big day) or what Indonesians would term as Lebaran (the end of fasting).

title: The Big Read: With vaping increasingly rampant among youths despite ban, what more can authorities do?
description: SINGAPORE — When Henry first started using electronic vapourisers, or vapes, back in 2020, it was because it “seemed easier to hide” and “tasted better” than normal cigarettes.

title: Russian gets 21 years for cheesecake-poisoning of US doppelganger
description: NEW YORK — A Russian-born woman was sentenced to 21 years in a US prison Wednesday (April 19) for trying to kill her American lookalike with poisoned cheesecake and then stealing her identity.

title: Gen Y Speaks: I was a spoilt child who fumbled aimlessly through school. Getting back on my feet wasn’t easy
description: Growing up, I was very pampered by my family, especially being the youngest out of three siblings.

title: 35 arrested over 11kg of drugs seized in 9-day raids targeting transactions using encrypted chat applications
description: SINGAPORE — Thirty five suspected drug offenders have been arrested and more than 11kg of drugs seized in a series of island-wide operations from April 11 to 19 targeted at transactions conducted through encrypted chat applications.

title: People lost faith in childhood vaccines during Covid-19 pandemic, says Unicef
description: LONDON — People all over the world lost confidence in the importance of routine childhood vaccines against killer diseases like measles and polio during the Covid-19 pandemic, according to a new report from Unicef. In 52 of the 55 countries surveyed, the public perception of vaccines for children de

title: Commentary: Singapore’s the 25th happiest country in the world — here are some ways to make it a happier place
description: Almost every year since 2012, the World Happiness Report (WHR) has been documenting the rankings of national happiness for hundreds of countries worldwide.

title: COE prices for cars break records for third round running — Category A premiums surpass S$100,000 for first time
description: SINGAPORE — Certificate of Entitlement (COE) prices for cars and open category vehicles hit new highs in the latest bidding exercise that ended on Wednesday (April 19).

title: Commentary: Illegal vapes' sweet-smelling juices mask their dangerous connection to organised crime
description: Soon, officers from the National Environment Agency (NEA) will be patrolling the streets, wary eyes out for litterers, smokers taking a puff in prohibited areas and a new offender: users of illicit electronic vaporisers.

title: Commentary: Why Singapore needs to move towards a meritocracy of skills and contributions
description: An educational meritocracy aims to reward on the basis of two ingredients: efforts and abilities.

title: The Big Read in short: How can S’pore tackle vaping prevalence among youths?
description: SINGAPORE — When Henry first started using electronic vapourisers, or vapes, back in 2020, it was because it “seemed easier to hide” and “tasted better” than normal cigarettes.

title: Gen Y Speaks: I didn’t do well in my first job. This is how I learnt not to beat myself up over it
description: I thought I was a hotshot. Yet I was rudely brought back down to Earth when in March 2021, my employer issued me with a performance improvement plan for various aspects of my work that the company was not satisfied with.

title: My Learning Diaries: My bosses’ decisions used to puzzle me. A 'FlexiMasters' course helped me see the light
description: The fast-changing nature of work has prompted many Singaporeans to upgrade their skills to stay relevant. TODAY’s Voices section is publishing first-hand accounts of young Singaporeans who have recently done so to give their careers a

title: My Learning Diaries: I’ve been paralysed from the waist down since 2018. That did not stop me from getting my degree in 2022
description: “Learning is not attained by chance; it must be sought with ardour and attended to with diligence.” I resonate with this quote by Abigail Adams — the first woman to serve as Second Lady of the United States — to never stop learning despite my medical condition.

title: Louis Koo was moved to tears during Sammi Cheng's Best Actress speech at Hong Kong Film Awards
description: Friendship goals.

title: Late casino king's daughter Laurinda Ho marries Chinese actor Shawn Dou in S$8.5mil Bali wedding
description: The couple reportedly hired 120 security guards for their big day.

title: Faye Wong seen on crowded airport shuttle with fellow travellers, internet says she's just like us
description: The down-to-earth star appeared casually dressed and seemed unbothered that she was being photographed.

title: Your Say: 3 ways to protect social workers from abuse and help them thrive
description: I refer to the article “Pay raise cold comfort for abuse that comes with job, say

title: Michelle Yeoh took 35mins to walk a 200m-long red carpet as there were too many fans asking for her autographs
description: Thousands of Malaysian fans turned up for the 60-year-old Oscar winner's fan meet in Kuala Lumpur yesterday (Apr 18).

title: Chai Chee western food stall sells crispy fried chicken wings at just $1 each
description: Very value-for-money if you have a large gathering.

title: Your Say: Mediation can be counterproductive for victims of workplace discrimination
description: The Ministry of Manpower (MOM)’s response to Aware’s recommendations on the upcoming workplace fairness legislation bears fu

title: To achieve FIRE, don’t rely on the spark of speculation
description: Financial independence and early retirement are popular goals for millennials and Gen Z workers – but getting there requires steady financial habits, not risky investments.

title: How milk fuels you up for the challenges ahead
description: Being able to handle stress well, whether in school or at work, starts with having the right nutrition. Here’s how the new Meiji Multivitamin Milk can help supplement your diet.

title: More than skin deep: Managing eczema and its symptoms
description: Regulating stress levels and using skin-friendly products can help bring relief to eczema-prone skin, say experts.

title: The right logistics partner: A game-changer in the ‘shoppertainment’ age
description: As more small businesses take to selling on entertainment platforms like TikTok, logistics provider J&T Express stands ready to deliver.

title: Shopee: The e-commerce platform that knows just what Singapore shoppers want
description: The company’s latest survey revealed that shoppers here – both young and old – are turning to the digital platform’s services for their shopping and entertainment needs.
